record.dc:title: 252BN30 Lick Creek Site 14BN30, Benton County, Tennessee. Artifact cache. Two large picks or spades, two shattered sherds. Square 51R5.
record.wpa:narrative: Two large picks or spades of grey ft., two ShA sherds nearby, jar and salt pan sherds given F.S. 44(a) and (b). Tow other small pieces ft. nearby. St I top. -1.4 DD.
record.wpa:comments: No record on file for this photograph.
